trait.name: Brutal Rage
entries: The Raging Axolotl gains advantage on melee weapon attack rolls when it has half its maximum hit points or fewer.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Raging Axolotl makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claw.

action.name: Bite
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d6 + 4) slashing damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Magdala is a 6th-level spellcaster. Her spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). Magdala has the following wizard spells prepared:

action.name: Dagger
entries: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

trait.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: Xal'Shir can use a bonus action to enter the Ethereal Plane until the start of its next turn. While on the Ethereal Plane, Xal'Shir can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 (1d10) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, Xal'Shir has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit Xal'Shir scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Fleshbound Horror
entries: Xal'Shir's lower half is a tangled mass of flesh and muscles. It has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to climb and can move across difficult terrain made of flesh or organic matter without penalty.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Xal'Shir is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

trait.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: When an attacker that Xal'Shir can see hits it with an attack, Xal'Shir can use its reaction to halve the attack's damage against it.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xal'Shir makes two blade attacks.

action.name: Blade Attack
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + @mod}) slashing damage, plus {@h}8 ({@damage 2d8}) psychic damage.

action.name: Ethereal Assassination
entries: Xal'Shir seamlessly shifts between the Ethereal Plane and the Material Plane, reappearing behind a target creature within 30 feet. It then makes a sneak attack with advantage, dealing an extra 6d6 damage on a hit. Additionally, if the attack roll is 18 or higher, it is a critical hit.

legendary.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Once per turn, Xal'Shir can deal an extra 21 (6d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Xal'Shir that isn't incapacitated and Xal'Shir doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Blade Rush
entries: Xal'Shir moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During this movement, it can make one blade attack against a creature it passes adjacent to.

legendary.name: Ethereal Ambush
entries: Xal'Shir uses its Ethereal Jaunt feature. Immediately after reappearing on the Material Plane, it can make one blade attack against a surprised creature it can see.

legendary.name: Cloak of Shadows
entries: Xal'Shir magically becomes invisible for up to 1 minute or until it attacks or casts a spell. While invisible, it can move up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Shadow Step
entries: Xal'Shir magically teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It can then make one blade attack as a bonus action.

legendary.name: Ethereal Shift
entries: Xal'Shir uses its bonus action to enter the Ethereal Plane until the start of its next turn. While on the Ethereal Plane, it is immune to all damage and effects from creatures on the Material Plane.

legendary.name: Blade Cyclone (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xal'Shir spins rapidly, creating a whirlwind of blades around itself. Each creature within 10 feet of Xal'Shir must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 (7d6) slashing damage and 24 (7d6) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Unseen Hunter
entries: Xal'Shir becomes invisible until the start of its next turn. While invisible, it has advantage on attack rolls against creatures that can't see it.

legendary.name: Shadowmeld
entries: Xal'Shir merges with the shadows, becoming indistinguishable from its surroundings. It gains a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Stealth) checks and can take the Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

legendary.name: Mind Thrust
entries: Xal'Shir targets one creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw, taking 33 (6d10) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Nightmarish Presence (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Xal'Shir releases an aura of psychic dread. Each creature of Xal'Shir's choice within 30 feet of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or be frightened for 1 minute. The frightened creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Psychic Resilience
entries: The Eldritch Mindshrieker has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: The Eldritch Mindshrieker has advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks and can communicate telepathically with any creature within 60 feet of it that understands a language.

action.name: Mindrending Shriek
entries: As an action, the Eldritch Mindshrieker emits a piercing psychic shriek. Each creature of its choice within 30 feet of it must make a DC 14 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 (4d10) psychic damage and become stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't stunned.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Eldritch Mindshrieker makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Psychic Resilience
entries: The Eldritch Mindrender has advantage on saving throws against being charmed or frightened.

trait.name: Aberrant Mind
entries: The Eldritch Mindrender has advantage on Intelligence (Investigation) checks and can communicate telepathically with any creature within 120 feet of it that understands a language.

trait.name: Leader's Aura
entries: The Eldritch Mindrender emits a commanding aura, granting advantage on saving throws against being frightened to friendly creatures within 30 feet of it.

action.name: Mindrending Shriek
entries: As an action, the Eldritch Mindrender emits a piercing psychic shriek. Each creature of its choice within 30 feet of it must make a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 24 (5d8 + 2) psychic damage and become stunned until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature takes half damage and isn't stunned.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Eldritch Mindrender makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Fiendish Presence
entries: Any creature within 30 feet of Malgorgon that can see it must succeed on a DC 14 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Bone Armor
entries: Malgorgon has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from non-magical weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Malgorgon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
